Text:
Please seed if you like the programs.  I have been uploading these classes to thousands of people from all over the world over the last 2 years, and it can be very slow for them without the help of other seeders.

Thanks for your help, and God bless you too.

Dingman firstly thank you for these files, Ralph Levy is the best commentator I have heard, i have downloaded everything from Chuck missler to Bob Utley and they all dance around the subject talking about everything but the text in question, Ralph takes you through the BIBLE. I have contacted ABC as im desperate to get the rest of the series, but they say they dont have it, the did direct me to some other audio files they offer, but its not this series. Can you please help and either upload the remaining files if you have them, or direct me to where i can get them. 

God Bless.

Tony.
